channel.title: Credit Requirements on Florida Jumbo Lenders
channel.description: Recent content in Credit Requirements on Florida Jumbo Lenders

item.title: Why Florida Jumbo Loans Demand Higher Credit Scores
item.description: Most borrowers understand that jumbo loans carry stricter requirements than conforming mortgages, but they underestimate just how much credit scores drive approval odds and pricing. While conforming lenders might approve buyers with scores in the mid-600s, jumbo specialists in Florida typically draw the line at 700 and offer their best rates to borrowers above 740. This is not arbitrary pickiness. It reflects fundamental risk differences between government-backed lending and portfolio jumbo products that lenders hold on their own books.
